Title: Quadrophenia
Writer: Dave Humphries (screenplay), Martin Stellman (screenplay), Franc Roddam (screenplay)
Actors: Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Phil Davis, Mark Wingett
Plot: London, 1965: Like many other youths, Jimmy hates the philistine life, especially his parents and his job in a company's mailing division. Only when he's together with his friends, a 'Mod' clique, cruising London on his motor-scooter and hearing music such as that of 'The Who' and 'The High Numbers', does he feel free and accepted. However, it's a flight into an illusionary world.
